query:
ALTER TABLE `audit_log`
  MODIFY COLUMN `action` enum('create','update','delete','view','export','share') NOT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `dataClassification` enum('public','internal','confidential','restricted') DEFAULT 'internal',
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `complianceTags` text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `retentionPolicy` varchar(50),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `ipAddress` varchar(45),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `userAgent` text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `sessionId` varchar(100);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute ALTER TABLE `audit_log`
  MODIFY COLUMN `action` enum('create','update','delete','view','export','share') NOT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `dataClassification` enum('public','internal','confidential','restricted') DEFAULT 'internal',
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `complianceTags` text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `retentionPolicy` varchar(50),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `ipAddress` varchar(45),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `userAgent` text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `sessionId` varchar(100);
